    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Comments] AS [c]
    WHERE [t].[Id] = [c].[PostId]) AS [CommentCount]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[PostContent], [u].[Username], [t].[UserId], CONVERT(varchar(100), [t].[CreatedAt]) AS [Created], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Comments] AS [c]
    WHERE [t].[Id] = [c].[PostId]) AS [CommentCount]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[CreatedAt], [p].[PostContent], [p].[UserId]
    FROM [Posts] AS [p]
    ORDER BY [p].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[CreatedAt] DESC

    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Comments] AS [c]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[PostContent], [u].[Username], [t].[UserId], CONVERT(varchar(100), [t].[CreatedAt]) AS [Created], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Comments] AS [c]
    WHERE [t].[Id] = [c].[PostId]) AS [CommentCount]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[CreatedAt], [p].[PostContent], [p].[UserId]
    FROM [Posts] AS [p]
    ORDER BY [p].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[CreatedAt] DESC

2025-03-23 10:02:58.205 -04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (33ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[PostContent], [u].[Username], [t].[UserId], CONVERT(varchar(100), [t].[CreatedAt]) AS [Created], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Comments] AS [c]
    WHERE [t].[Id] = [c].[PostId]) AS [CommentCount]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[CreatedAt], [p].[PostContent], [p].[UserId]
    FROM [Posts] AS [p]
    ORDER BY [p].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[CreatedAt] DESC

    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Comments] AS [c]
    WHERE [t].[Id] = [c].[PostId]) AS [CommentCount]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[PostContent], [u].[Username], [t].[UserId], CONVERT(varchar(100), [t].[CreatedAt]) AS [Created], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Comments] AS [c]
    WHERE [t].[Id] = [c].[PostId]) AS [CommentCount]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[CreatedAt], [p].[PostContent], [p].[UserId]
    FROM [Posts] AS [p]
    ORDER BY [p].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

    ORDER BY [p].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

SELECT COUNT(*)

2025-03-23 15:09:20.271 -04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (39ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[PostContent], [u].[Username], [t].[UserId], CONVERT(varchar(100), [t].[CreatedAt]) AS [Created], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Comments] AS [c]
    WHERE [t].[Id] = [c].[PostId]) AS [CommentCount]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[CreatedAt], [p].[PostContent], [p].[UserId]
    FROM [Posts] AS [p]
    ORDER BY [p].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[CreatedAt] DESC

    FROM [Comments] AS [c]
    WHERE [t].[Id] = [c].[PostId]) AS [CommentCount]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[CreatedAt], [p].[PostContent], [p].[UserId]
    FROM [Posts] AS [p]
    ORDER BY [p].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[CreatedAt] DESC

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[PostContent], [u].[Username], [t].[UserId], CONVERT(varchar(100), [t].[CreatedAt]) AS [Created], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Comments] AS [c]
    WHERE [t].[Id] = [c].[PostId]) AS [CommentCount]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[CreatedAt], [p].[PostContent], [p].[UserId]
    FROM [Posts] AS [p]
    ORDER BY [p].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[CreatedAt] DESC
